title: English Listening and Reading
description: Deze wikiwijs is bedoeld voor de studenten Engels op het MBO (niveau 4) die moeten oefenen voor hun aankomende (lees- &) luistertoets. De vragen zijn op A2, B1 en B1+/B2 niveau.

license.name: CC Naamsvermelding 4.0 Internationale licentie
license.description: De Internationale Creative Commons 4.0 licentie waarbij de gebruiker het werk mag kopiëren, verspreiden en doorgeven en afgeleide werken mag maken onder de voorwaarde: Naamsvermelding, zie http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/.

items.content:
Goededag allemaal!

Welkom op het lesarrangement wat wij (Emre en Laura) voor jullie hebben ontworpen en ontwikkeld. Op deze pagina kunnen jullie doormiddel van verschillende activiteiten oefenen voor jullie lees- en luisterexamens.

Begin eerst met de Reading Instaptoets. Kies hier voor het Examen MBO B1 2018-2019 (Let op dat je niet voor een Dos examen kiest, deze is voor slechthorende). Op basis van de behaalde uitslag kun je verder gaan met de desbetreffende opdrachten. Wanneer je dit hebt afgerond kun je verder met het onderdeel Listening Examen MBO B1 2019-2020.

Heel veel succes!

At the end of this arrangement you will be able to use and explain at least three different reading strategies.

At the end of this arrangement the student have worked on these assignments individually for at least 15 minutes.

At the end of this arrangement you will know at what level of English you are, so you will be able to work on your English accordingly.

items.title: Instaptoets - Reading
items.description: Maak hierbij de instaptoets, vanaf vraag 1 t/m 20 (Reading). Kijk aan het einde naar hoeveel van de 40 punten je behaald hebt (voor de duidelijkheid, 20 antwoorden tellen niet mee, dus eigenlijk tel je hoeveel goed je hebt van de 20 vragen van ). Als je onder 14 goed hebt, werk door aan niveau A2. Als je tussen 14-17 goed hebt, werk door in niveau B1. Als je boven 17 goed hebt, werk dan door aan niveau B1+/B2, succes!

items.content:
Omdat jullie lees- en luisterexamens binnenkort zullen plaatsvinden, is het erg belangrijk dat je leert op welke manier je een tekst kan lezen. Doordat er verschillende strategien zijn die je kunt toepassen, kun je op een effectieve manier een tekst in je op nemen. Wanneer je dit goed onder de knie hebt en de verschillende strategien kunt onderscheiden, zul je merken dat het lezen van een tekst gemakkelijker, duidelijker en sneller zal gaan.

Om het onderscheid tussen de strategien te kunnen maken moet je goed begrijpen welke vraag je moet beantwoorden. In het volgende filmpje wordt hier aandacht aan besteed! Luister goed en ga vervolgens verder met de opdrachten.

introduction.body: On this page you can find the English exercises A2. If anything is unclear or wrong, please send me a message on teams or via email! Good luck!

questions.label: Read the following test and answer this question: What is meditation?

prompt.body:
The Benefits of Meditation

Meditation is a practice that has been around for thousands of years, and its popularity has only increased in recent times. Meditation is a way to calm your mind and body and to focus your thoughts on the present moment. It is a simple yet powerful tool that can be used by anyone, regardless of age, gender, or religious beliefs. In this text, we will discuss some of the benefits of meditation.

One of the most significant benefits of meditation is its ability to reduce stress and anxiety. When you meditate, you focus your mind on your breath, which helps to slow down your heart rate and relax your muscles. This, in turn, helps to reduce stress and anxiety levels in your body.

Meditation can also help to improve your sleep quality. By practicing meditation before bed, you can relax your mind and body, which can help you fall asleep faster and stay asleep longer. Additionally, meditation can also help to reduce insomnia and other sleep disorders.

Another benefit of meditation is its ability to improve concentration and focus. When you meditate, you train your mind to focus on one thing at a time, which can help you stay focused and avoid distractions in your daily life. This can be especially helpful for students and professionals who need to concentrate on their studies or work.

Meditation can also help to improve your overall mental health. Studies have shown that regular meditation can help to reduce symptoms of depression and anxiety, improve mood, and increase feelings of well-being.

Finally, meditation can help to improve your physical health as well. It has been shown to reduce blood pressure, lower cholesterol levels, and boost the immune system.

In conclusion, meditation is a simple yet powerful practice that can have numerous benefits for both your mind and body. Whether you are looking to reduce stress and anxiety, improve your concentration and focus, or improve your overall health, meditation is definitely worth trying.

content.body: A way to focus your thoughts on the past
A way to calm your mind and body and to focus your thoughts on the present moment
A way to focus your thoughts on the future

questions.label: Put the text into the right order

prompt.body:
My Favorite Holiday Destination

I love going on holiday, but there is one place that I enjoy visiting the most: the beach. Every summer, my family and I travel to the coast and spend a week relaxing in the sun. We always stay in a small hotel close to the beach, and it is the perfect place to escape from the stress of everyday life.

......

content.body: In the evenings when the temperature has gone down, we like to explore the local restaurants and try the fresh seafood. There are so many delicious dishes to choose from, but my favorite is the grilled fish with garlic and lemon. We also like to visit the local markets and buy souvenirs for our friends and family back home.

When we arrive, the first thing we do is put on our swimsuits and head straight to the beach. The sand is soft and warm, and the water is crystal clear. We love to swim, play beach volleyball, and build sandcastles. We also take long walks along the shore, collecting shells and watching the waves crash against the rocks.

On our last day, we always make sure to take a family photo on the beach to remember our holiday. It is sad to say goodbye, but we always look forward to coming back next year. The beach is our favorite holiday destination, and we can't wait to make more memories there in the future.

Despite the heat, we always make sure to visit some of the local attractions. One of my favorites is the aquarium, where we can see all kinds of marine life up close. We also enjoy visiting the nearby town and exploring the old buildings and museums.
Goed gedaan! In deze tekst zit een duidelijke structuur. De eerste en laatste zinnen geven vaak een goede indicatie over de volgorde! Dat is bij deze tekst ook relevant. Ga zo door!
Bij leesteksten is het vaak te zien in welke volgorde de alinea's horen door de eerste en de laatste zinnen. Deze geven vaak namelijk al een kleine hint voor wat erna gaat komen. Nog even oefenen!

questions.label: Read the following paragraph and answer this question: What does Emily study?

prompt.body: Emily is a student. She studies history at the University of Michigan. She has a lot of different history books. From the Middle Age to the Renaissance, she loves them all. She reads them every day. Emily also really likes to watch movies about history. Her favorite movie is about the Roman Empire. That movie is called Pompeii, after the ancient city that got engulved under lava and ash after the eruption of the vulcano Vesuvius.

content.body: History major about the Roman Empire

questions.label: What is the importance of eating healthy?

prompt.body:
Healthy Eating Habits

Eating healthy is important for maintaining good health and preventing chronic diseases. Healthy eating involves consuming a variety of nutrient-rich foods from all of the food groups. Here are some tips for establishing healthy eating habits:

  1. Eat a variety of foods. Eating a variety of foods ensures that you get all the nutrients your body needs. Aim to eat a variety of fruits, vegetables, whole grains, lean proteins, and healthy fats.
  2. Watch portion sizes. Pay attention to the amount of food you are consuming. Use smaller plates and bowls to help control portion sizes.
  3. Limit sugar and salt. Too much sugar and salt in the diet can increase the risk of chronic diseases. Try to limit your intake of sugary and salty foods and opt for healthier alternatives.
  4. Drink plenty of water. Drinking enough water is important for maintaining good health. Aim to drink at least 8 cups of water a day.
  5. Don't skip meals. Skipping meals can lead to overeating later in the day. Try to eat 3 meals a day and have healthy snacks in between.

By following these tips, you can establish healthy eating habits that will help you maintain good health and prevent chronic diseases.

After I finished reading, I decided to some more books home with me. I found a great about animals and a cookbook with some healthy recipes. I can't wait to try them out!

Correct answers:

  2. borrow
  3. bring
  4. book

introduction.body: After you finished the test with atleast 14 correct answers or you finished the exercises on A2 level, you can start with the B1 exercises. When you finish the exercise with more than 10 correct answers, you can continue with the B1 exercises.

prompt.body:
Coffee is one of the most popular drinks in the world. It's enjoyed by people of all ages and backgrounds. Coffee is made from roasted coffee beans, which come from coffee plants. These plants are found in many countries, including Brazil, Colombia, and Ethiopia.

The way coffee is prepared varies from country to country. In some places, it's served strong and black. In other places, it's served with milk or cream. Some people like to add sugar or honey to their coffee. There are even some people who prefer to drink their coffee iced.

Although coffee is a beloved beverage, it's not without its drawbacks. Drinking too much coffee can lead to jitters and insomnia. Some people also experience acid reflux and other digestive issues. It's important to drink coffee in moderation and be aware of its potential side effects.

content.body: They make coffee of cocoa beans
Coffee is made from roasted coffee beans
You can make it with milk, sugar or even honey

The beverage that is cherished around the globe - Coffee

The way coffee is prepared varies from country to country. In some places, it's served strong and black. In other places, it's served with milk or cream. Some people like to add sugar or honey to their coffee. There are even some people who prefer to drink their coffee iced.

Although coffee is a beloved beverage, it's not without its drawbacks. Drinking too much coffee can lead to jitters and insomnia. Some people also experience acid reflux and other digestive issues. It's important to drink coffee in moderation and be aware of its potential side effects.

content.body: Coffee should be enjoyed black or with a little cream.
Coffee can also be enjoyed iced, with sugar or honey, or without any additional ingredients.

questions.label: Why is it important to drink coffee in moderation?

prompt.body:
Please read the following passage and answer the question:

Coffee is one of the most popular drinks in the world. It's enjoyed by people of all ages and backgrounds. Coffee is made from roasted coffee beans, which come from coffee plants. These plants are found in many countries, including Brazil, Colombia, and Ethiopia.

The way coffee is prepared varies from country to country. In some places, it's served strong and black. In other places, it's served with milk or cream. Some people like to add sugar or honey to their coffee. There are even some people who prefer to drink their coffee iced.

Although coffee is a beloved beverage, it's not without its drawbacks. Drinking too much coffee can lead to jitters and insomnia. Some people also experience acid reflux and other digestive issues. It's important to drink coffee in moderation and be aware of its potential side effects.

content.body: Coffee is quite beneficial because it can help you with health problems such as jitters, insomnia, and digestive issues.
You can drink as much coffee as you want to, but you can experience different side effects afterwards.
It's important to drink coffee in moderation to avoid potential side effects such as jitters, insomnia, and digestive issues.

content.body: To memorize every detail in the text

questions.label: Reading strategies: Answer the following question

content.body: To use prior knowledge and evidence to make an educated guess about something not explicitly stated in the text
To summarize the main idea of a text
To find specific information in a text
